title: Use the shell history efficiently
body: Press the Up arrow to cycle through previous commands, and use `history | grep <keyword>` to find old commands quickly.

title: Use aliases for frequent commands
body: Define aliases like `alias ll='ls -la'` in your shell config (e.g. ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc) to speed up everyday commands.

title: Combine SSH with tmux for remote work
body: Run long tasks over SSH inside tmux or screen sessions to avoid losing work when your connection drops.
